products.name: Shirts
products.description: Shirts and tops are the bestselling products for this season, with t-shirts being the most popular clothing category. Thanks to universal demand and an endless variety of designs, shirts are a perfect fit for many online stores.

products.name: Makeup
products.description: Makeup is a consistently popular product category, with new tools and techniques continually reinventing the industry. In 2023, lip stain topped the trending product list, and continuing search interest suggests this item will remain relevant into 2025.

products.name: Dresses
products.description: Alongside pants, dresses are another popular product for 2025. Sales of dance dresses and costumes have grown 46%, reflecting surging interest in this activity.
